elements.name: projectName
elements.title: Enter the name of your project:

elements.name: projectDuration
elements.title: How long has your project been ongoing?
choices: Less than 6 months
6 months to 1 year
1 to 2 years
More than 2 years

elements.name: teamSize
elements.title: What is the size of your project team?
choices: 1-5 members
6-10 members
11-20 members
More than 20 members

elements.name: q1
elements.title: How often do Agile Events take place?
choices: All agile ceremonies are identified and  followed regularly with a defined Cadence in Calendar for next 3 months
All agile Events are identified ,  followed regularly & recorded in Jira /relevant tool
All agile Events are identified and  followed regularly in a cadence
Basic Project level meetings are being followed
Some of Agile Events are defined and followed yet not regular

elements.name: q2
elements.title: Agile Governed by?
choices: Governed by Scrum Master/ SPM / Team manager & Product owner collectively
Governed through Team Manager & Client Calls to Team regularly
Governed by Team manager
Self Organized by team under servant leadership key roles of Agile Framework
Self Organized team but  guided & mentored by all roles

elements.name: q3
elements.title: How well does your team understand Agile?
choices: Agile Certified leaders are present within teams for coaching / guidance with all of team members
Agile trainings are included in learning plan for non-trained as well as new members
Agile trainings are arranged frequently for team members
Limited team members are trained in agility with trainings
Very basic and limited knowledge within team

elements.name: q4
elements.title: What level of knowledge does your team have with Agile practices?
choices: Highly experienced and fully integrated
limited  experience and seeking guidance
Some experience but looking to improve
No experience with Agile practices
Unaware

elements.name: q5
elements.title: How does your team receive project requirements?
choices: Requirements created collaboratively with team and refined with business background and acceptance criteria
Requirements received in story format from features / epics along with business context
Requirements  received at Feature or Epic level with business context
Requirements received at high level in document format
Requirements received in emails / over a call

elements.name: q6
elements.title: Does the product have a Product Owner/Business Requirement Manager?
choices: Product has a Dedicated Product Owner
Assigned Product owner acts on behalf of customer
Product Owner is part of Agile team
Part- time  Product Owner / Owners
No Product Owner

elements.name: q7
elements.title: Does the product have a Scrum Master?
choices: Assigned dedicated SM/SPM full time
Assigned dedicated SM
Assigned part time individual  (not yet SM / SPM )
Assigned team member as a SM as per ROTA
No Scrum Master/Service Process Manager

elements.name: q8
elements.title: How does your team build and prioritize user stories?
choices: All team members use user stories
Most work uses user stories
Half the efforts use user stories
Teams understand user stories Rarely followed
Never used

elements.name: q9
elements.title: How frequently does your team conduct team reviews and retrospectives?
choices: Teams attend reviews & Retrospectives and seek stakeholders involvement to find reviews valuable
Reviews occur regularly and teams attend them
Team not prepared to review stories or are resistant to comments andsuggestions
Rarely or infrequently happen
Never happen
